title: Part One: Tzar Nicholas II Was A Real Dick
itunes:title: Part One: Tzar Nicholas II Was A Real Dick
description:
Robert is joined by Jeff May for part one of our four part series on Tzar Nicholas II.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://sci-hubtw.hkvisa.net/10.2307/1396423

  7. https://www.historytoday.com/archive/reforms-tsar-alexander-ii

  11. Radzinsky, Edvard. The Last Tsar Knopf Doubleday Publishing Group
